title: Big Hole National Battlefield: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations        Commercial Film and Photography are permitted in the park providing you have applied for a Special Use Permit.  Please contact the park to get a permit application and to start the process.    Â     First Amendment Activities are welcome at Big Hole. The First Amendment area is in front of the visitor center and near the tipi.  First Amendment activities must not interfere with other premitted activities or regular park programing. Groups of less than 25 people are exempt from filing a permit request.
